de.trantor.mail.j2me
Class ConnectionImpl

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--de.trantor.mail.Connection
        |
        +--de.trantor.mail.j2me.ConnectionImpl
public class ConnectionImpl
extends Connection

Provides a concrete descendent of the abstract "Connection" class that can be used in J2ME environments that support sockets, that is, the plain TCP protocol. Is is based on the Generic Connection Framework provided by the javax.microedition.io package.

See Also:
Connection, javax.microedition.io.StreamConnection

Opens a connection with the given host on the given port. If the ssl parameter is true, secure socket layer is used.
